item.title: [Python] I was able to print the thermal printer PAPERANG from Python (Windows10, Python3.6)
item.description: Sorry I made you wait! I was able to print the thermal printer “PAPERANG” from Python. #Sample code Download from here Environment $ conda create -n paperang python=3.6 $ conda activate paperang $ cd miaomiaoji-tool $ pip install PyBluez-win10 $ pip install opencv-python Execute $python message_process.py Commentary I am changing what I forked from here. When I try to execute message_process.py, I get an error in the filter function. Include the filter functions on lines 47 and 64 in list.
